1901300.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901300
In-book reference  : Book 21, Hadith 001
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 21, Hadith 001
1901300.text: Jabir ibn Samura said: "I saw Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) leaning on a cushion on his left side.”

1901310.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901310
In-book reference  : Book 21, Hadith 002
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 21, Hadith 002
1901310.text: 'Abd ar-Rahman ibn Abi Bakra reported that his father Abu Bakra said: “Allah’s Messenger said (Allah bless him and give him peace): ‘Should I tell you about the greatest of the major sins?’ They said: ‘Yes indeed, O Messenger of Allah!’ He said: ‘Associating partners with Allah, and recalcitrance against parents.’ Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) sat down, and he was leaning on a support. He added: '...and false testimony’ or: ‘false speech.’ Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) went on speaking until we said: ‘If only he would keep silent!”

1901320.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901320
In-book reference  : Book 21, Hadith 003
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 21, Hadith 003
1901320.text: Abu Juhaifa said: "Allah’s Messenger said (Allah bless him and give him peace):‘As for me, I do not eat while leaning on a support!’”

1901330.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901330
In-book reference  : Book 21, Hadith 004
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 21, Hadith 004
1901330.text: Abu Juhaifa said: "Allah’s Messenger said (Allah bless him and give him peace): 'I do not eat while leaning on a support! I do not eat while leaning on a support'!”
